settings.title: Settings
settings.content: Here are the current settings of the guild:
settings.invalidArgumentLength: You supplied an invalid amount of arguments.
settings.invalidChannel: You supplied an invalid channel. Make sure it exists and is part of this server.
settings.invalidRole: You supplied an invalid role. Make sure it exists and is part of this server.
settings.invalidLanguage: You supplied an invalid language code. Please use one from the following list:
settings.updated: I updated the setting **`${name}`** with the value **`${value}`**.
settings.notImplemented: This setting is currently not available.
settings.proOnly: This setting is part of Emberspace Pro and thus is not available to this server.
settings.deprecated: This command has been deprecated in favor of the new settings command.

confirm.noPendingAction: You don't have a pending action that requires confirmation.

help.title: Help
help.content: To view a list of commands, please use the help command on one of the categories listed below.
help.support: f you need support for the bot, please use the support command.
help.configurationContent: Commands that control the bots behavior

invite.content:
You can invite Emberspace to your server with the following link:
${invite}

commands.invalidSubCommand: I did not recognize the subcommand you gave me.

mute.missingRole: This server has no muted role set yet.

case.created: Done! You can find this case in your moderation log or on the dashboard under the id **`${id}`**.
case.revoked: Done! If the user was banned or muted, then those actions have been reversed.
case.deleted: Done! If the user was banned or muted, then those actions have been reversed.
case.notNotified: I was unable to notify the user! This could've been caused because I don't share any servers with them, they closed their direct messages or they blocked me.
case.noReason: No reason has been given by the moderator
case.timeNotInFuture: The time you gave must be at least 30 seconds into the future.
case.infoTimed: You are about to ${method} **`${user}`**. They will be ${revokeMethod} **`${when}`**.
case.infoGive: You are about to give **`${user}`** a ${method}.
case.infoRevoke: You are about to revoke the case **`${id}`**.
case.requireConfirmation: Because confirmations are enabled, you need to use the `confirm` command to execute this action. You have **`${time}`** seconds to do this.

common.userNotFound: I could not find that user.
common.userAlreadyBanned: **`${user}`** is already banned from this server.
common.userAlreadyMuted: **`${user}`** is already muted in this server.
common.userNotBanned: **`${user}`** is not banned from this server.
common.userNotMuted: **`${user}`** is not muted in this server.
common.noPermissions:
You don't have sufficient permissions to use this command.
Execution requires the permission(s) **${permissions}**.

moderated.staffNoteTitle: You have received a staff note
